product_name: Outdoor Research Halogen Hoodie Jacket - Men's
long_description: Winner of the 2014 Outside Magazine Gear of the Year Award, the men's Outdoor Research Halogen Hoodie Jacket is the first lightweight insulated jacket that climbs as well as it belays. Schoeller(R) underarm side panels stretch and breathe through crux moves. Lightweight, water-resistant 60g PrimaLoft(R) One synthetic insulation keeps you warm during brisk predawn starts and blustery afternoons. Super-lightweight Pertex(R) Quantum outer fabric is windproof and water resistant. Hybrid construction makes the Halogen an ideal choice for action in damp, cold alpine environments, where lightweight, packable, breathable warmth is critical. Fully adjustable, close-fitting hood has stretch panels and a unique side-gasket system to conserve heat. Zippered Napoleon pocket; zippered hand pockets; jacket stuffs into the left-hand pocket. Drawcord hem and stretch binding at cuffs help seal in warmth. The men's Outdoor Research Halogen Hoodie Jacket features a full-length front zipper backed by a storm flap to block wind.
